sub_title: Experienced Product | Process | Project Management professional
summary:
Experienced Product /Project manager - User, data, and commercial-minded professional 
SCRUM Master certified

9-month Corporate Process Design 
5 years of Product Ownership
5 years of IT/Digital Project Management
1 year in sales management (wholesale & retail)

Customer experience 360: Retail, B to B, E-commerce, Client and Product Database management, CRM, M-commerce, Website management/release & Customer Care 

Experience with both Desktop & Mobile website/applications product development & release management

Sector exposure: Fintech, Fashion & Luxury

Personality traits : Flexible, curious and resilient

Computer skills:

-Software: Pack Office (Mac & PC), Nice Perform (use & user set-up), Microsoft Project Management
-POS System: Cegid Retail, AS 400 
-Project follow-up software: Quality Center, Atlassian Suite and TFS (Microsoft)
-Collaboration tools: Trello & Miro
-Database extraction software: Cisco CCX Reports 
-PIM Systems: Informatica PIM, Akeneo 
-CMS: RBS, WordPress & Graph CMS
-E-commerce management software: ATG Web Commerce
-Hardware skills: VoIP, IP/TCIP logger configuration & Mobile Payment Ingenico Device project
-Workforce management software: Kronos Workforce Forecast Manager 
-Analytics: Google Analytics, Site Catalyst
-Others: Survey Monkey, Balsamiq, Agorapulse, Canva, TrendyBuzz, Trello 

Experience in building products with the following programming languages & services: 
Languages: Python, Java, .net, Angular Js, Javascript, Html, CSS, swagger, SQL
Amazon services: S3, Jumpcloud, Cognito, Amazon Lambda and ECS instances
Microsoft services: Azure Cloud

Project Management method : AGILE & SCRUM (Scrum Master Certified)

awards.title: Concours général des lycées et des métiers section Sciences économiques et sociales
awards.description:
Le Concours général a pour fonction de distinguer les meilleurs élèves ou apprentis et de valoriser leurs travaux. Il évalue les candidats sur des sujets conformes aux programmes officiels, mais dans le cadre d'épreuves plus exigeantes et plus longues que l'examen du baccalauréat.

Sujet de dissertation : Le coût du travail détermine-t-il les choix de l'entreprise ?

profile_positions.description:
While acting as a Senior Product Owner I came to the conclusion that several potential critical gaps existed in the management of our relationship with 3rd party Fintech integration.
After identifying these gaps, I shared a proposal with my management which was accepted and I was appointed to design all processes for Fintech 3rd party onboarding & management.

Within the Backbase Marketplace department, I am currently responsible for building from scratch the partnership lifecycle process from potential Fintech partner selection to integration maintenance. The goal is to provide guidance & guidelines for each stakeholder involved in the process as well defining the owner of each process stage in agreement with them. 

Achievement: 
- Led strategic meetings with stakeholders to identify actions to be performed at which stage of the process and mapped actions into an understandable format for all business stakeholders 
– High-level & zoomed-in views. -Developed from scratch crucial generic tools & templates for each process stage enabling stakeholders to get clarity on responsibilities and ensure ownership of projects. 

Achievement:
- In 6 months time I worked closely with all department involved with Fintech integration management : Product, Procurement, Legal, Compliance, Support, Project, Finance & Tech and delivered a full on process for new partners screening, onboarding & management (including all templates). 
- These process have now been used across the business for the past 8 months and widely mitigated, increased our professionalism, efficiency and faster delivery while mitigating risks as process are accessible across the organisation instead of being own by a couple of individuals.
- Building of our way of working for a new cross functional company department focussed on 3rd party integration & management : team member onboarding, team ceremonies & enforcement of process following.
profile_positions.title: Partner program Process Manager

profile_positions.description:
Within Backbase Digital Sales Value Stream I am currently in charge of the Retail flow & journeys (adoptable software building blocks), our goal is to develop configurable Vanilla solutions (Web & Native apps) to enable banks to acquire new customers or customers to acquire new products without leaving their house.


Achievement:
-Delivery of a large portfolio of complex new features for the Retail Onboarding flow
-Actively support the delivery & "Go live" of 2 customers project using our Vanilla project (Web & Mobile) & more to come!
- Building a strong relationship with Project department & external services provider in order to continuously improve our products following real use case & new opportunities

Operational missions:
Manage a cross-functional team of 8 engineers (up to 10 engineers)
Build, drive and update the Product Retail Onboarding & Origination management roadmap
Lead business meetings with a large panel of stakeholders and advise on feasibility, dependencies, risks and timeline of deliveries
Drive Product deliverable along their whole lifecycle from benchmark to handover to support
Act as a product expert on Retail onboarding best practices & advise on project solutionning
Lead business/tech conversation to evaluate deliverables timelines
Find the right priorisation balance between business request and necessary technical improvements
Align our roadmaps with other product owners to make sure dependent piece of work can be completed in time & adjust when necessary
Foreseen planning, resources and technical issues and escalate to find solution before problems occur
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
Within Bestseller e-commerce head office department I was in charge of the design, application and prioritization of the product Product Experience roadmap (Product descriptions, product attributes, product images maintaining the whole flow of service involved and their delivery) serving 17 fashion brands.

As part of the product experience development team my role is to translate business priorities and requirement into development ticket so that our team of developers can evaluate and describe the best technical solution to serve our business objectives. As part of our continual growth I am making sure working closer to the team that we are enabling innovation, system trustworthiness and process improvement along our development journey.

Achievement:
-Build and release of in-house Amazon services based Digital Asset Manager ( 500K images) in charge of : medias intake, resizing, validation, storage & distribution
-Build & release of a new data-sharing architecture allowing more frequent data update and the ability to extend our product data set (more languages and new products attributes)
-Rework on our business proposition, transfer of non-static product data management and removal of dependencies to unleash scalability

Operational missions:
Build, drive and update the Product information management roadmap
Lead business/tech conversation to evaluate deliverables timelines
Lead business meetings and advise on feasibility, dependencies, risks and timeline of deliveries
Find the right priorisation balance between business request and necessary technical improvements
Brainstorm with the technical team to evaluate the most sustainable development approach
Share the roadmap plan and vision with internal & external stakeholders
Align our roadmaps with other product owners to make sure dependent piece of work can be completed in time
Foreseen planning, resources and technical issues and escalate to find solution before problems occur
profile_positions.title: Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
At Runpath an Experian owned Fintech company, I was in charge of the production, delivery and test management of technology product related to retail financial market.

I was in charge of Market (Product Selection) product category for Runpath, which include the management of 5-7 people (including 4 developers) , but also 36 products accross 7 active clients accounts 

 I worked closely with our team product manager in order to:

-Liaise with company ́s clients to scope, estimate and plan products delivery according to company ́s standard
-Schedule and prioritise work each iteration for our team of 6-8 developers and make sure no impediments block their progression facilitating communication and decision making
-Schedule releases and make sure that items are released in time for the test team
-Coach and empower the team to get constant feedbacks in order to improve our processes
-Communicate project progression (timescale, budget, delivery) to clients and senior management and escalate eventual issues
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Within ALAIN AFFLELOU digital services, and with two other project managers we are in charge of the brand´s eco system management for France as well as international digital projects coordination for foreign team.

-Main project : Manage release project Management of our website from brief to roll-out including
innovative API, global front end redesign as well as e-commerce implementation
-Source needs, design, follow up and tests our websites releases (design, content & innovations)
-Lead, follow up and test our mobile website development
-Identify TMA´s need, manage development follow up & tests
-Design detail web functional specifications and UML scheme for external development agencies
-Working in liaise with all department involved in website design (content & development) : law, sales and CRM
-Project coordination with foreign internal teams (Emailing, Shooting or Community management)
-Handling community management strategy & operational tasks (Facebook, Instagram, Youtube &
Twitter communities)
-Manage commercial and customer oriented project such as emailing or E-commerce policy
-Daily management of our website front content and design through CMS and slight programming
modification in liaise with our in house artistic director
-Reporting production and follow up of our eco-system performance
profile_positions.title: Digital Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Operational management within Europe Client Service of both Quality  Performance & Planning of teams as well as sales reporting activity 
- Production and follow up of E-commerce and Phone Sales KPIs per country and for whole Europe (turnover, conversion rate, sales evolutions in value and volume, % of returns…)    
-Production and follow up of KPI linked to Client Service quality trend (Service level, Handled calls, Immediate response…)
-Being a key user on web-commerce application, planning & KPI production tool
-Occasionally help anti-fraud team within their daily work (cross check clients details & call clients when necessary) and help them within their decisions towards several orders
- Help Client service´s team managers providing them detail figures on their team activities or in order to handle disputes with clients
-Support on set up and follow up of reporting activity within Middle East client service´s opening, especially giving complete training on reporting tools and sharing reporting/planning best practices
-Occasionally train client service associates´ on several IT tools
-Production of detail sales analyses within each team activity and think up improvement axes by market in order to improve sales performance 
-Design various presentations on Client Service Activity for internal and external visitor
profile_positions.title: Business Data Analyst E-commerce & customer care

profile_positions.description:
Integrated to the corporate Louis Vuitton IT headquarter, I was in charge of innovative solution design, creation, and implementation & follow up in direct link with our internal client related services.

Operational tasks:
-Management all phases of 4 IS projects through AGILE method dedicated to retail, client service and CRM teams in Paris and in our 6 delocalized headquarters worldwide 
-Being creative and think up user friendly and efficient tools aiming to help teams in direct contact with clients to offer to those clients a unique and innovative experience. 
-Organize, plan and lead « workshop » with different teams in order to better understand their needs and expectations
-Translate & prioritize business needs and requirement in order to deliver clear guidelines & consistent elements to technical teams
-Project scope definition, objectives definitions, success criteria design with business agreement, identify the project team, design and presentation of project planning 
-Design detailed specifications (UML – activity /use case diagram) of processes and responsibilities owners 
-Identify & communicate on process and project best practices  
-Maintain transversal relationship through lead of steering committees (in-site and through visio)
-Coordination/mobilization of IT resources & business partner to guarantee our projects successes 
-Issues escalation when project planning and/or budget are threatened 
-Project follow-up, creation of functional tests books, UAT tests, management and follow-up of correction, design of solution user guides, when necessary manage releases 
-Meeting final users: training and follow up of project pilots
-Follow up of project implementation : respect of timing and local constraints (law and resources availability)
-User support level 1 during project phase and long term maintenance support set up 
-Legal research in France & abroad to identify key constraints and rules before projects roll-out
profile_positions.title: Project IS Manager Junior front office

profile_positions.description:
As Cartier Sales Manager Assistant I was in charge of glasses after sales service for Spain & Portugal markets, my daily work was to manage relationships with sales representatives, brand retailers & product stock located in France.
I also have been asked to design a standardize process for after sales service management in order to save time and improve efficiency as well as communicate and ensure that new process was followed by retailers and sales representatives.
I also occasionally helped the sales administrator into sales order management for perfumes and glasses as well as visiting retailers in Madrid for sales purposes on country manager request. 

-Manage relationship with retailers, sales representatives and stock in order to deliver the best service possible to our B to B and final clients. 
-Design a standardize process for after sales service : identify the most efficient process, validation of the process, communication and change management with retailers & sales team, communicate results of this new method through consumers feedbacks to sales team and retailers
-Manage glasses ‘after sales service : Cost estimates after sales service operations, validate the operation with sales representatives or retailers (negotiation) , create and follow up orders as well as delivery 
-Assist country manager in dispute management with retailers 
-Assist sales administrative colleague within perfumes & glasses orders as well as follow with brand´s stock (especially during peak season) 
-Involvement with sales meeting
-Occasionally visit retailers in order to solve disputes or presenting sales offers designed by country managers
profile_positions.title: Assistant Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Management of ERES’s retailers : multi-brand & department stores 
- Autonomous sales in seasonal Showroom for the brand with key retailers (Harrods London & Aeroport de Paris)  
- Management of sales services tasks : 
•	Brand promotion
•	Creation of incentives for retail teams
•	Collection selection for partnership events with department stores for events : « Jours or » au Printemps Haussmann & « TBBM » with le Bon Marché
profile_positions.title: Assistant Sales Manager

profile_positions.description: Advice clients, implement and develop strong customer relationships, inventory management (finished goods and packaging), shop merchandising management for 3 months in Saint Germain des Prés, Paris area.
profile_positions.title: Sales Associate

volunteer_experiences.description: I performed with a friend the volontary translation from Spanish to English of the documentary "Los Sandinistas" about Nicuraguayan revolution for Matthew Somerville (film maker)
